x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
- Integrating YouTube Live Chat with ServiceNow allows viewers to make instant donations during live rescue or awareness streams.

- Donors can see how their contributions are used through automated ServiceNow dashboards tracking fund allocation and rescue outcomes.

- Encourages people to adopt, foster, or volunteer by connecting them directly to shelter databases and available animals.

- Automates ticketing for animal rescues, food shortages, or medical emergencies logged by shelter staff or volunteers.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many animal shelters are forced to euthanize stray animals due to limited funding, overcrowding, and lack of real-time support from the community. Despite public compassion, there’s no transparent, easy, and real-time way for people to contribute funds during awareness events or live rescue efforts. This leads to thousands of animals being euthanized every year simply because shelters lack immediate financial and volunteer support.
